turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where do you want to get it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Destiny

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Caffè Latte venti with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. Caffè Latte venti with almond milk? right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll be ready for you when you get there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're Awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do I have anything else going on today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to fill in the rest of this questionairre.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long is that going to take.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A few more lines.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well...How's the wife?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: She's good. Just got a promotion.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, tell her I said congrats.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing.
